name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Alfred HOYLE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Alfred HOYLE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted, 274 Pa. Super. 220, 418 A.2d 376.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Timothy J. Savage, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 334
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Alfred HOYLE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 8, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Timothy J. Savage, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
